name: P&C Game - Web
description:
It is a one player simple version of my P&C Game

https://bertrand-t3gu1.itch.io/

We play it with a mouse, just by clicking. Paul (for the player) wants to go out of  Carole's heart. Paul chooses path lines and Carole chooses path directions. The player have to find an optimal strategy of choosing lines to win the game with less steps and less time.

You have three levels, simple level, level 1 and level 2 (fidelity level). You can click on Help to get instructions.

Very nice game to enjoy on free time! Let's play!
